[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00110111_10000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into SFP   00101111_00000000_00000000
    FLOAT 00110111_10000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into SFP   00101111_00000000_00000000
    SFP   00101111_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00110111_10000000_00000000_00000000
    SFP   00101111_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00110111_10000000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    00101111_00000000_00000000 + 00101111_00000000_00000000 = 00110000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    00101111_00000000_00000000 * 00101111_00000000_00000000 = 00011111_00000000_00000000
